```{r}
background <- "#f5f5dc"
text_colour <- "white"
title <- "#1D1D1D"
wisconsin <- "#C5050C"

theme_style <- theme(legend.position = "bottom",
                     plot.background = element_rect(fill = background, color = NA),
                     text = element_text(family = "Arial Black", color = title),
                     plot.subtitle = element_markdown(size = 10, hjust = 0,
                                                  color = title),
                     plot.caption = element_text(size = 7))


theme_set(theme_style)
```


```{r}
p <- (e | d) / (a | b) / (auc_wi | c) +
  plot_annotation(title = "Spray particle deposition study in <b style='color:#C5050C;'>Wisconsin</b>",
                  subtitle = "Investigations of spray particle deposition at upwind, inswath and downwind. <b style='color:#0479a8;'>ANOVA</b> was perfomed for pray particle deposition at upwind and <br>inswath, and a <b style='color:#0479a8;'>Linear Model</b> was used to predict pray particle deposition with distance at downwind. Hooded sprayer makes a bigger <br>difference on spray particle deposition, followed by nozzle and drift reduction agent.",
                  theme = theme(plot.title = element_markdown(size = 20, margin = margin(3, 0, 3, 0),
                                                          family = "fredoka"))) &
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#FFFFFF", color = NA),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#F5F5F5", color = NA))


  ggsave("wisconsin.pdf", p, width = 9, height = 12)
```
